Description: St Mary of Egypt and St Mary Magdalene; in a landscape, the two saints stand next to each other; St Mary of Egypt to the left, holding three loafs of bread, Mary Magdalene to the right, with her vessel; in the centre before them kneels a monk in diminuitive size; banderoles with text; inscription on the lower margin left and r; second state. c. 1500 Engraving
Producer name: Print made by: Israhel van Meckenem
Bibliographic references: Lehrs 1908-34 / Geschichte und kritische Katalog des deutschen, niederländischen und französischen Kupferstichs im XV Jahrhundert (IX.309.384.II)
Hollstein / German engravings, etchings and woodcuts c.1400-1700 (384)
Associated names: Representation of: St Mary of Egypt
